body.p: 1. Binnui’s son and one of the two Levites present when the temple treasure that was brought back to Jerusalem by Ezra was weighed and recorded (Ezr 8:33).
2. Prophetess who, along with Tobiah, Sanballat, and some false prophets, attempted to intimidate Nehemiah when he was engaged in rebuilding Jerusalem’s walls after the exile (Neh 6:14).
